name: nativescript-couchbase
description: Couchbase Lite plugin for Telerik NativeScript

scripts.setup-angular: cd ng-demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd ng-demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
scripts.setup-vanilla: cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
scripts.setup: npm run setup-vanilla; npm run setup-angular
scripts.prepare-angular: npm run build; cd ng-demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-couchbase; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.prepare-vanilla: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-couchbase; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare-vanilla; npm run prepare-angular
scripts.android-angular: npm run prepare-angular; cd ng-demo; tns run android
scripts.android-vanilla: npm run prepare-vanilla; cd demo; tns run android
scripts.ios-angular: npm run prepare-angular; cd ng-demo; tns emulate ios
scripts.ios-vanilla: npm run prepare-vanilla; cd demo; tns emulate ios

author: Nic Raboy
